description: "Although this mid-19th century map covers all of mainland Southeast Asia, the Burman Empire (Myanmar) is shown in greater detail, especially its districts, rivers and place names. It was produced by the James Wyld, geographer to Queen Victoria."
title: "Map   of   the   Burman   Empire   Including   also   Siam,   Cochin-   China,   Ton-king   and   Malaya"
